QuestData.Title: Challenge of the Masters
QuestData.Description: The time has come to challenge the Burning Blade masters.$B$BGo to the back of the cavern. There you will find the challenge ring and the masters watching over it from above.$B$BPull the blade from the middle of the ring to issue your challenge. My clan values honor above all else and will respect your claim to trial by combat.$B$BAs reward, you will be allowed to walk away with your life. Or, you will be dead.
QuestData.LogDescription: Survive the Burning Blade's trial by combat.
QuestData.RewardText: A great victory over the Burning Blade!$B$BThis new Warlord Azuka Bladefury sounds formidable. We'll have to keep an eye on her and her blademasters.
